name: A Guy Steals a Golden Trumpet
name_original: A Guy Steals a Golden Trumpet
description:
In this short choose your own adventure, you play Guy Mann, and his attempt to steal the famous Golden Trumpet.

This game is also on Game Jolt: 

https://gamejolt.com/games/aguystealsagoldentrumpet/552154

The Sequal is here too, not for download yet:

https://gamejolt.com/games/aguyfreesdave/553607

(PS if you couldn't tell this is a fangame of Henry Stickmin)
